徧字的基本解释

徧
biàn
同“遍”。

徧字的汉语字典释义

[①]［biàn］
［《廣韻》方見切，去線，幫。］
“扁4”的被通假字。“遍1”的古字。“偏2”的被通假字。
(1)普遍；全部。
(2)谓遍及。
(3)量词。表示动作从头到尾完成的次数。
(4)量词。唐宋时称乐曲的结构单位。今存词调犹可见其遗迹，如《哨徧》、《泛清波摘徧》。
[②]［piān］
［《集韻》紕延切，平，滂。］
同“偏1”。
(1)偏私。
(2)辅助；辅佐。参见“徧2手錢”、“徧2師”。

徧字的康熙字典解释

【寅集下】【彳字部】　徧； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页369第13
【廣韻】比薦切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?見切，?編去聲。【說文】帀也。【廣韻】周也。【書·舜典】徧于羣神。【詩·小雅】羣黎百姓，徧爲爾德。【左傳·莊二十年】樂及徧舞。【疏】言樂之所有，舞悉周徧也。　又【廣韻】俗作遍。【魏志·賈逵傳註】逵最好春秋左傳，自課誦之，月常一遍。　又【集韻】或作辯。【禮·曲禮】然後辯殽。【註】辯音徧，義同。　又【集韻】或作辨。【史記·五帝紀】辨于羣神。【書·舜典】作徧。　又與蹁通。【集韻】蹁或作徧。　又與偏通。【集韻】偏通作徧。

Basic explanation of words
all over
biàn
Same as "pass".
all over
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［biàn］
["Guangyun" Fang saw cut, go to the line, help. ]
"Bian 4" was passed falsely. The ancient character of "Bian 1". "Part 2" was passed falsely.
(1) Universal; all.
(2) That is universal.
(3) Quantifiers. Indicates the number of times the action has been completed from beginning to end.
(4) Quantifiers. It is called the structural unit of music in the Tang and Song Dynasties. The remnants of the existing tunes can still be seen, such as "Shaobian" and "Panqingbo Digested".
[②]［piān］
["Ji Yun" Yan Yanqie, flat , pang. ]
Same as "Part 1".
(1) Partiality.
(2) Auxiliary; auxiliary. See "Bai 2 hands of money", "Bai 2 divisions".

[Yin Jixia] [彳字部] 　bian; Kangxi strokes: 12; page number: page 369 13
[Guang Yun] compare recommended cut [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun] See cut, make up the sound. [Said the text] also. [Guang Yun] Zhou Ye. 【Book·Shun Code】All over the gods. 【Poetry·Xiaoya】Qunli people are everywhere. [Zuo Zhuan·Twenty Years of Zhuang] Music and dance. 【Shu】All the words and music are all, Wu learns about Zhoubian.　[Guangyun] It's popular all over the world. [Notes on the Biography of Wei Zhi·Jia Kui] Kui's best Chuan Qi Zuo Zhuan, recite it by himself, once a month.　[Jiyun] or argue. [Li·Qu Li] Then confuse it. [Note] Debate the sound and have the same meaning.　 [Ji Yun] or make a distinction. 【Historical Records·Five Emperors】Distinguished from the group of gods. 【Book·Shun Code】Complete all over.　 and Jian again. 【Jiyun】Cross or repeat.　 and partial. [Jiyun] Partially pass all over.
